reviewText: Set over a 1-0 year time period.  Lost Virgin starts the amazing actress Nikki Sasaki, as a woman who looses her virginity at 18 during a one off sexual encounter and then meets the man again five years later.  They have sex and part only to meet up yet again five years later still.  This is one of the films published as the Japanese Pink Cinema Collection.  Lovely ladies and well done sex scenes with plenty of female nudity.  One of the better 'PINK' films.
